meanings.definition: Noles (noun): A member of the Seminole tribe.
meanings.sent1: The noles gathered around the fire to share stories.
meanings.sent2: She met a friendly noles at the cultural event.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous noles played a prank on his friend.
meanings.sent4: The noles stood tall like ancient trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the noles caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Noles (verb): To refuse or decline something.
meanings.sent1: He decided to noles the offer of a second piece of cake.
meanings.sent2: She always noles invitations to social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to noles the idea of taking a bath.
meanings.sent4: The student noles to participate in the group project.
meanings.sent5: The dog would noles any food that wasn't his favorite.

meanings.definition: Noles (adjective): Of or relating to Florida State University.
meanings.sent1: The noles football team played a great game last night.
meanings.sent2: She proudly wore her noles hoodie to support the team.
meanings.sent3: The noles campus was buzzing with excitement during homecoming.
meanings.sent4: The noles alumni network is strong and supportive.
meanings.sent5: The noles colors of garnet and gold filled the stadium.
